events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on icy roads resulting in significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle damage description.
An agent with experience in auto claims was assigned to handle the case for effective processing.
Confirmation has been sent to the customer acknowledging receipt of the auto accident claim.
Customer requested to provide police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
All required documents including police report and vehicle repair quotes have been submitted by the claimant.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision and liability determination has officially begun.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault and damages are covered under the policy.
A settlement offer covering the full repair costs has been proposed to the claimant.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the service.
Claim approval was finalized following acceptance of the settlement terms by the claimant.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was processed and transferred to the claimant's account.
The claim file has been officially closed as all processes were completed successfully.
The closed claim has been archived in the records system for future reference if needed.
